_create_table_channels_: create table channels (channel_id int primary key default nextval('_sequencename_') ,title varchar(500),url varchar(1000),vid_ts timestamp,mod_ts timestamp default now () );
_create_table_channelname_: create table _channelname__channel(channel_id int references channels(channel_id),vid_id int primary key default nextval('_sequencename_'), vid_title varchar(1000),vid_release_ts timestamp,mod_ts timestamp default now());
_create_table_channel_transcript_: create table _channelname__transcript (channel_id int references channels(channel_id),vid_id int references _channelname__channel(vid_id),transcript_id int primary key default nextval('_sequencename_'),start_ms float,end_ms float,transcript varchar(10000),mod_ts timestamp default now ());
_create_sequence_sequencename_: create sequence _sequencename_ start 1 increment 1 minvalue 1 NO MAXVALUE;
